segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nālaṃ saṃghamhā vapakāsituṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is not fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena piṇḍapātena, asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena senāsanena, asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena, kāmasaṅkappabahulo ca viharati.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is not content with any kind of robe, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And they have a lot of sensual thoughts.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nālaṃ saṃghamhā vapakāsituṃ.
segments.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is not fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ saṃghamhā vapakāsituṃ.
segments.en: A mendicant with five qualities is fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena piṇḍapātena, santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena senāsanena, santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena, nekkhammasaṅkappabahulo ca viharati.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is content with any kind of robe, alms-food, lodging, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And they think a lot about renunciation.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ saṃghamhā vapakāsitun”ti.
segments.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is fit to live apart from a Saṅgha community.”
